title: @ ＥＶＥＲＹＯＮＥ，you have 24 hours to ＧＥＴ ＩＮ ＨＥＲＥ
body: You have been served notice ＥＶＥＲＹＯＮＥ. If you cannot ＧＥＴ ＩＮ ＨＥＲＥ and ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ HEHE, pile on ヽ༼ຈل͜ຈ༽ﾉ in that time frame I will make it my personal mission to have you fired. I will not stop until you are bounced from the community or until you man up and admit how fuckin shitty your ideas and system are and start (ง'̀-'́)ง A fight? COUNT ME IN! The choice is yours. ＧＥＴ ＩＮ ＨＥＲＥ. Or get the fuck out of dodge. Choose.
